short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds entries from the Network -> Catch Up page to the news section. This helps with finding birthdays, jobs changes and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances your browsing experience by adding entries from the Network -> Catch Up page to the news section on your front page. This integration helps you easily find updates such as birthdays, job changes, and more without needing to navigate through multiple pages.

With this extension, you can keep track of significant events and changes within your network, making it simpler to stay informed and maintain connections. Whether it’s congratulating a colleague on a new job or remembering a friend’s birthday, this tool provides timely updates in a convenient location.

Stay connected and updated with this straightforward extension that brings relevant network updates to your front page.
